Usage
Edit mode

Typical operations

  • Arrange a chip (to the Front channel) ... Left click
  • Arrange a chipï¼ˆto the Back channel) ... Ctrl + Left click
  • Arrange a chip (to the Alternative channel) ... Ctrl + Alt + Left click
  • Delete a chip (in any channels) ... Right click
  • Arrange a chip (Force (ignore lane related chip); to the Front channel) ... Shift + Left click
  • Arrange a chip (Force (ignore lane related chip); to the Back channel) ... Shift + Ctrl + Left click
  • Specify the lane-related chip (to the Front channel) ... Left click on the top of the lane
  • Specify the lane-related chip (to the Back channel) ... Ctrl + Left click on the top of the lane
  • Cancel the lane-relation (in the Front channel) ... Right click on the top of the lane
  • Cancel the lane-relation (in the Back channel) ... Ctrl + Right click on the top of the lane
